main: ^Ready to start helping out around here? Good. First things first:
^Whatever those folk that took you are up to, seems like they've been working out of a church in town.
^If you wanna try to stop this, that's the first place I'd go. And I would, but I don't have that arm of yours.
^Best talk to the Bishop over there first, though.

c-0: ^ Seems like you know quite a lot about all this.
c-1: ^ I'll go talk to the Bishop, then.

elaboration: ^Here's what I know. All this has got something to do with Pacific Manifest, that corporation buildin' the rail through the valley.
^We used to work for 'em, but I organized some folk and we went on strike. We've been holed up here since.
^I got us out of there right when I figured that they were up to no good. Folk were disappearin', or comin' to work different.
^That church is my best bet at findin' out what happened. So... please.
